704418f-a.folder: Fort Greene Place & Hanson Place, Brooklyn, NY
704418f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Fort Greene Place - Hanson Place
704418f-a.text:
1) 172-182 Fort Greene Place, west side, between Hanson Place and Atlantic Ave.
October 6, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

2)  178-80 Ft. Greene Pl. B'KLYN
Whole sale meat market
Julius Dahlman, owner
J. Graham, Architect
Dismantled Apr. 1978 Atlantic Terminal Urban Renewal
(Scott Witter)

704419f-a.folder: Fort Greene Place & Hanson Place, Brooklyn, NY
704419f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Fort Greene Place - Hanson Place
704419f-a.text:
Fort Greene Place, north from near Hanson Place across the intersection of Lafayette Avenue and Fulton Street, showing,
on the latter, the B. M. T. "E1" station.

View l: June 15, 1940
View 2: August 20, 1941

P. L. Sperr

View 2: Fort Greene Place, south from Lafayette Avenue

view 2: Neg. No. A-1036

706951f-a.folder: Fort Greene Place & Hanson Place, Brooklyn, NY
706951f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Fort Greene Place - Hanson Place
706951f-a.text:
Fort Greene Place, north from Hanson Place, showing the B. M. T. "El' on Fulton Street. In the right foreground is the Y. M. C. A. Building.
May 17, 1940
P. L. Sperr
